trans-unit.source: Supplies base class implementation for all activity designer theme classes used in a workflow design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a implementação da classe base para todas as classes de tema do designer de atividade usadas em um ambiente de tempo de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: All classes that supply theme property settings to <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> classes must inherit from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> class.
trans-unit.target: Todas as classes que fornecem configurações de propriedade de tema para <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> classes herde o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> classe.

trans-unit.source: Designer themes provide a set of property values with which to display background and foreground colors and styles, fonts, and other style settings for the designer classes displayed on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Temas designers fornecem um conjunto de valores de propriedade com o qual deseja exibir o plano de fundo e cores de primeiro plano e estilos, fontes e outras configurações de estilo para as classes de designer exibidas em uma superfície de design do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> class also inherits from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> classe também herda de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" /> with which the designer theme is associated.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" /> ao qual o tema do designer está associado.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme" /> class by using a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementada em uma classe derivada, inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme" /> usando um objeto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unqualified name of the designer type to which the designer theme is applied.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome não qualificado do tipo de designer ao qual o tema do designer é aplicado.

trans-unit.source: The name of the designer type to which the designer theme is applied.
trans-unit.target: O nome do tipo de designer para o qual o tema do designer é aplicado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ApplyTo%2A> property associates the designer theme with a designer by using the unqualified name of the designer type, while the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.DesignerType%2A> property associates the designer theme with a designer type by using the <xref:System.Type> of the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ApplyTo%2A> propriedade associa o tema designer um designer usando o nome qualificado do tipo designer, enquanto o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.DesignerType%2A> propriedade associa o tema do designer com um tipo de designer usando o <xref:System.Type> do designer.

trans-unit.source: A user attempted a set operation when the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly" /> property was set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Um usuário tentou uma operação de conjuntos quando a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly" /> foi definida para <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the workflow theme that encapsulates the designer theme.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tema do fluxo de trabalho que encapsula o tema do designer.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" /> object associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" /> objeto associado a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ContainingTheme%2A> property returns the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> object that the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.%23ctor%2A> used during initialization.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ContainingTheme%2A> propriedade retorna o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> do objeto que o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.%23ctor%2A> usado durante a inicialização.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of the designer associated with the designer theme.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo do designer associado com o tema do designer.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that represents the designer to be associated with the current designer theme.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Type" /> que representa o designer deve ser associada com o tema atual do designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.DesignerType%2A> property associates the designer theme with a designer type by using the <xref:System.Type> of the designer, while the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ApplyTo%2A> property associates the designer theme with a designer by using the unqualified name of the designer type.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.DesignerType%2A> propriedade associa o tema do designer com um tipo de designer usando o <xref:System.Type> do designer, enquanto o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ApplyTo%2A> propriedade associa o tema designer um designer usando o nome qualificado do tipo de designer.

trans-unit.source: Possible values for this property include <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, and any classes created by activity designer developers that inherit from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>.
trans-unit.target: Os valores possíveis para essa propriedade incluem <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>e as classes criadas por desenvolvedores de designer de atividade que herdam de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>.

trans-unit.source: A user attempted a set operation when the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly" /> property was set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Um usuário tentou uma operação de conjuntos quando a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly" /> foi definida para <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <see langword="false" /> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme" /> e opcionalmente libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Allows the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme" /> to attempt to free resources and perform other clean-up operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Permite que o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme" /> tente liberar recursos e executar outras operações de limpeza antes que ele seja recuperado pela coleta de lixo.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.Finalize%2A> releases only unmanaged resources prior to garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.Finalize%2A> libera apenas recursos não gerenciados antes da coleta de lixo.

trans-unit.source: Performs further initialization tasks beyond those performed by <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.#ctor(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme)" />.
trans-unit.target: Executa tarefas de inicialização adicionais além daquelas realizadas por <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.#ctor(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme)" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> class provides no default behavior for this method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> classe fornece um comportamento não padrão para este método.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> must provide their own logic for this method.
trans-unit.target: Classes que herdam de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> deve fornecer sua própria lógica para este método.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty" /> enumeration value that the designer theme should now use.
trans-unit.target: O valor de enumeração <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty" /> que o tema do designer deve usar agora.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer theme class that the ambient property settings for the designer have changed.
trans-unit.target: Notifica a classe de tema do designer que as configurações de propriedade de ambiente do designer foram alteradas.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> use this method to make necessary changes when the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> enumeration value changes from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.DesignerSize> to <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.OperatingSystemSetting> or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.OperatingSystemSetting> to <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.DesignerSize>.
trans-unit.target: Classes que herdam de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> use este método para fazer necessárias alterações quando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> altera o valor de enumeração de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.DesignerSize> para <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.OperatingSystemSetting> ou <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.OperatingSystemSetting> para <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.DesignerSize>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> enumeration determines where a designer theme obtains its ambient property settings.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> enumeração determina onde um tema designer obtém suas configurações de propriedade de ambiente.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.DesignerSize> value is set, the designer theme class obtains its ambient settings from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.AmbientTheme%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.DesignerSize> valor estiver definido, a classe do designer de tema obtém suas configurações de ambiente do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.AmbientTheme%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.OperatingSystemSetting> value is set, the designer theme class obtains its ambient settings from the operating system on which the designer is installed.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.OperatingSystemSetting> valor estiver definido, a classe do designer de tema obtém suas configurações de ambiente do sistema operacional em que o designer está instalado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the designer theme is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o tema do designer é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme" /> is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme" /> é somente leitura; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> that the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> is initialized with is not a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly%2A> obtains its value from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> que o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> é inicializada com não é uma referência nula (`Nothing` no Visual Basic), <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly%2A> obtém o valor da <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> is a null reference (`Nothing`), <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly%2A> is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> é uma referência nula (`Nothing`), <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly%2A> é `false`.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> is assigned to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly%2A> property is set to `true`, and properties on all designer themes associated with this theme cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> é atribuído para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly%2A> está definida como `true`, e propriedades em todos os temas designers associados a este tema não podem ser alteradas.

trans-unit.source: If required, properties can be set after loading the theme but before assigning it to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se necessário, as propriedades podem ser definidas depois de carregar o tema, mas antes de atribuí-lo para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: Realiza tarefas definidas pelo aplicativo associadas à liberação ou à redefinição de recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: This version of `Dispose` implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: Esta versão do `Dispose` implementa o <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
